org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.impl.zk

Interface RegistryInternalConstants


  • public interface RegistryInternalConstants
    Internal constants for the registry. These are the things which aren't visible to users.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String HADOOP_USER_NAME
      This the Hadoop environment variable which propagates the identity of a user in an insecure cluster
      static int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_READERS
      Permissions for readers: 1.
      static int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_SYSTEM_SERVICES
      Permissions for system services: 31
      static int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_USER_ROOT
      Permissions for a user's root entry: 15.
      static String SASLAUTHENTICATION_PROVIDER
      Name of the SASL auth provider which has to be added to ZK server to enable sasl: auth patterns: "org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.SASLAuthenticationProvider".
      static String VALID_PATH_ENTRY_PATTERN
      Pattern of a single entry in the registry path.
      static String ZOOKEEPER_AUTH_PROVIDER
      String to use as the prefix when declaring a new auth provider: "zookeeper.authProvider".

    • Field Detail

      • VALID_PATH_ENTRY_PATTERN

        static final String VALID_PATH_ENTRY_PATTERN
        Pattern of a single entry in the registry path. : "([a-z0-9]|[a-z0-9][a-z0-9\\-]*[a-z0-9])".

        This is what constitutes a valid hostname according to current RFCs. Alphanumeric first two and last one digit, alphanumeric and hyphens allowed in between.

        No upper limit is placed on the size of an entry.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_READERS

        static final int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_READERS
        Permissions for readers: 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_SYSTEM_SERVICES

        static final int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_SYSTEM_SERVICES
        Permissions for system services: 31
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_USER_ROOT

        static final int PERMISSIONS_REGISTRY_USER_ROOT
        Permissions for a user's root entry: 15. All except the admin permissions (ACL access) on a node
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SASLAUTHENTICATION_PROVIDER

        static final String SASLAUTHENTICATION_PROVIDER
        Name of the SASL auth provider which has to be added to ZK server to enable sasl: auth patterns: "org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.SASLAuthenticationProvider". Without this callers can connect via SASL, but they can't use it in ACLs
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ZOOKEEPER_AUTH_PROVIDER

        static final String ZOOKEEPER_AUTH_PROVIDER
        String to use as the prefix when declaring a new auth provider: "zookeeper.authProvider".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HADOOP_USER_NAME

        static final String HADOOP_USER_NAME
        This the Hadoop environment variable which propagates the identity of a user in an insecure cluster
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
